skills.skill: Performing at a quick pace while having fun
Working as part of a team to accomplish daily goals
Coming up with great ideas to solve problems

duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet customers, run the register, cashier, make purchase suggestions, and sometimes work with the food program.
Work around the store in many different areas to help maintain high standards for store appearance and provide fast and friendly service to customers.
Interact with many customers daily, while working with a fun, energetic team to accomplish daily tasks around the store.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or GED preferred.
